mapper.select: SELECT /*WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getRegisterCompanyCount*/ count(*) FROM ( SELECT D.* , ( SELECT rsume_stts_cd FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) rsume_stts_cd, ( SELECT mng_stts_cd FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) mng_stts_cd, ( SELECT appctn_stts_chng_dtm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) appctn_stts_chng_dtm, ( SELECT mng_stts_chng_dtm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) mng_stts_chng_dtm FROM ( SELECT YEAR(A.year) as year, A.episd, B.appctn_seq, B.sbrdn_bsnm_no, B.reg_id, B.reg_dtm, B.mod_dtm, C.*, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = C.ctgry_cd) as ctgry_cd_nm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = C.size_cd) as size_cd_nm, (SELECT MAX(rsume_ord) FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl WHERE appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq) rsumeOrd, B.appctn_bsnm_no as bsnm_no, (SELECT cmpn_nm FROM cp_cmpn_mst WHERE bsnm_no = B.appctn_bsnm_no) as cmpn_nm FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'BSN09' ) A INNER JOIN cx_appctn_mst B ON B.episd_seq = A.episd_seq INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.mem_seq, a.name, a.id, a.hp_no, a.email, b.ctgry_cd, b.size_cd FROM co_mem_mst a INNER JOIN cp_cmpn_mst b ON a.work_bsnm_no = b.bsnm_no ) C /* 회원-회사 JOIN 테이블 */ ON C.mem_seq = B.mem_seq ) D ) F
SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getOptYearList */ DISTINCT YEAR(year) FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = #{bsnCd} ORDER BY year ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.putAppctnMst */ INTO cx_appctn_mst ( appctn_seq, episd_seq, mem_seq, appctn_bsnm_no, sbrdn_bsnm_no, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{appctnSeq}, #{episdSeq}, #{memSeq}, #{bsnmNo}, #{sbrdnBsnmNo}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.putAppctnFileDtl */ INTO cx_appctn_file_dtl ( appctn_seq, file_cd, file_seq, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{appctnSeq}, #{fileCd}, #{fileSeq}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.putAppctnRsumeDtl */ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_dtl ( rsume_seq, rsume_ord, appctn_seq, rsume_stts_cd, appctn_stts_cd, appctn_stts_chng_dtm, mng_stts_cd, mng_stts_chng_dtm, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, #{rsumeOrd}, #{appctnSeq}, #{rsumeSttsCd}, #{appctnSttsCd}, now(), #{mngSttsCd}, now(), #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.updCmpnCbsnMst */ cp_cmpn_mst SET ctgry_cd = #{ctgryCd}, size_cd = #{sizeCd}, stbsm_dt = #{stbsmDt}, tel_no = #{compTel}, zipcode = #{zipCode}, bsc_addr = #{bscAddr}, dtl_addr = #{dtlAddr}, sls_pmt = #{slsPmt}, sls_year = #{slsYear}, mple_cnt = #{mpleCnt}, mjr_prdct_1 = #{mjrPrdct1}, mjr_prdct_2 = #{mjrPrdct2}, mjr_prdct_3 = #{mjrPrdct3}, qlty_5_star_cd = #{qlty5StarCd}, qlty_5_star_year = #{qlty5StarYear}, qlty_5_star_year = NULL, pay_5_star_cd = #{pay5StarCd}, pay_5_star_year = #{pay5StarYear}, pay_5_star_year = NULL, tchlg_5_star_cd = #{tchlg5StarCd}, tchlg_5_star_year = #{tchlg5StarYear}, tchlg_5_star_year = NULL, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE bsnm_no = #{bsnmNo}

UPDATE /*WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.updCoMemMst*/ co_mem_mst SET tel_no = #{telNo}, dept_cd = #{deptCd}, dept_dtl_nm = #{deptDtlNm}, pstn_cd = #{pstnCd}, pstn_nm = #{pstnNm}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE mem_seq = #{memSeq} AND id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.insCmpnCbsnDtl */ cp_cmpn_cbsn_dtl ( bsnm_no, cbsn_seq, nm, score, year, crtfn_cmpn_nm, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{bsnCd}, #{cbsnSeq}, #{nm}, #{score}, #{year}, #{crtfnCmpnNm}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

where.if: AND ( CMPN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR HP_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR BSNM_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR REG_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') )

mapper.select: SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.selectSupplyDtl */ C.ID, C.NAME, C.EMAIL, C.DEPT_CD, C.DEPT_DTL_NM, C.PSTN_CD, C.DEPT_DTL_NM, C.PSTN_NM, C.HP_NO, C.TEL_NO, D.YEAR, D.EPISD, D.EPISD_SEQ, A.ADM_MEMO, A.ADM_MEMO_MOD_DTM, A.MEM_SEQ, B.CMPN_NM, B.RPRSNT_NM, B.CMPN_NFRML_NM, B.CMPN_CD, B.CTGRY_CD, B.SIZE_CD, B.STBSM_DT, B.TEL_NO AS COMP_TEL, B.ZIPCODE, B.BSC_ADDR, B.DTL_ADDR, B.SLS_PMT, B.SLS_YEAR, B.MPLE_CNT, B.MJR_PRDCT_1, B.MJR_PRDCT_2, B.MJR_PRDCT_3, B.QLTY_5_STAR_CD, B.QLTY_5_STAR_YEAR, B.PAY_5_STAR_CD, B.PAY_5_STAR_YEAR, B.TCHLG_5_STAR_CD, B.TCHLG_5_STAR_YEAR, B.ADM_MEMO, B.REG_ID, B.REG_IP, B.REG_DTM, B.MOD_ID, B.MOD_IP, B.MOD_DTM, B.BSNM_NO, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD = ( SELECT APPCTN_STTS_CD FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) ) AS APPCTN_STTS_CD_NM, (SELECT APPCTN_STTS_CD FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS APPCTN_STTS_CD, (SELECT APPCTN_STTS_CHNG_DTM FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS APPCTN_STTS_CHNG_DTM, (SELECT MNG_STTS_CD FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS MNG_STTS_CD, (SELECT MNG_STTS_CHNG_DTM FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS MNG_STTS_CHNG_DTM, (SELECT rtrn_rsn_cntn FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS rtrn_rsn_cntn, (SELECT FILE_SEQ FROM CX_APPCTN_FILE_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS APPCTN_SEQ, (SELECT orgn_file_nm FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_SEQ = F.FILE_SEQ) AS FILE_NM FROM CX_APPCTN_MST A INNER JOIN CP_CMPN_MST B ON A.APPCTN_BSNM_NO = B.BSNM_NO INNER JOIN CO_MEM_MST C ON A.MEM_SEQ = C.MEM_SEQ INNER JOIN CX_EPISD_MST D ON A.EPISD_SEQ = D.EPISD_SEQ INNER JOIN CX_APPCTN_FILE_DTL F ON A.APPCTN_SEQ = F.APPCTN_SEQ WHERE A.APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.updAppctnRsumeDtl */ cx_appctn_rsume_dtl SET APPCTN_STTS_CD = #{appctnSttsCd},
APPCTN_STTS_CHNG_DTM = NOW(),
MNG_STTS_CD = #{mngSttsCd},
MNG_STTS_CHNG_DTM = NOW(),
RTRN_RSN_CNTN = #{rtrnRsnCntn},
mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE appctn_seq = #{detailsKey}

UPDATE /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.uptAppctnMst */ cx_appctn_mst SET mem_seq = #{memSeq}, appctn_bsnm_no = #{bsnmNo}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE appctn_seq = #{detailsKey}
mapper.select: SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getChangeList */ TRNSF_SEQ, APPCTN_SEQ, BFRE_MEM_SEQ, ( SELECT NAME FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = BFRE_MEM_SEQ ) BFRE_MEM_NM, ( SELECT ID FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = BFRE_MEM_SEQ ) BFRE_MEM_ID, AFTR_MEM_SEQ, ( SELECT NAME FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = AFTR_MEM_SEQ ) AFTR_MEM_NM, ( SELECT ID FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = AFTR_MEM_SEQ ) AFTR_MEM_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = REG_ID) REG_NAME, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DTM FROM CX_APPCTN_TRNSF_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getChangeCount */ COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_TRNSF_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL
APPCTN_SEQ IN
#{item}
AND MNG_STTS_CD != 'PRO_TYPE06001_02_001' AND APPCTN_STTS_CD != 'PRO_TYPE06001_01_001'
SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.selectRecent*/ RSUME_SEQ , APPCTN_SEQ , RSUME_STTS_CD , REG_DTM FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE RSUME_STTS_CD = 'PRO_TYPE06001' ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.selectPartsCompanyList */ BSNM_NO , RPRSNT_NM , CMPN_NM , CMPN_CD , CTGRY_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'COMPANY_TYPE' AND CD = A.CTGRY_CD) AS CTGRY_NM , SIZE_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'COMPANY_TYPE' AND CD = A.SIZE_CD) AS SIZE_NM , BSNM_NO , BSC_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , SLS_PMT , MPLE_CNT , TEL_NO , STBSM_DT , ZIPCODE , TEL_NO , MJR_PRDCT_1 , MJR_PRDCT_2 , MJR_PRDCT_3 , QLTY_5_STAR_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'COMPANY_TYPE' AND CD = A.QLTY_5_STAR_CD) AS QLTY_5_STAR_CD_NM , QLTY_5_STAR_YEAR , PAY_5_STAR_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'COMPANY_TYPE' AND CD = A.PAY_5_STAR_CD) AS PAY_5_STAR_CD_NM , PAY_5_STAR_YEAR , TCHLG_5_STAR_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'COMPANY_TYPE' AND CD = A.TCHLG_5_STAR_CD) AS TCHLG_5_STAR_CD_NM , TCHLG_5_STAR_YEAR , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM FROM CP_CMPN_MST A
ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

choose.otherwise: AND ( INSTR(#{q}, CMPN_NM) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, BSNM_NO) > 0 OR )
